snippet: Spell-check can’t replace the keen eyes of an experienced editor. So, let’s put those keen eyes and experience to work, and eliminate some of these embarrassing mix-ups involving similar-sounding words. Many of these are pointed out by careful...
abstract: Spell-check can’t replace the keen eyes of an experienced editor. So, let’s put those keen eyes and experience to work, and eliminate some of these embarrassing mix-ups involving similar-sounding words. Many of these are pointed out by careful readers who expect better of us. Granted, the readers are not working on deadline — but they aren’t New York Times writers and editors, either.
